character.background: Night owl who often stays up late gaming. Likes to voice chat with people but doesn't talk much with strangers. Loves small animals, especially cats.

special_features.style: Prefers black simple clothing and accessories

appearance.clothing: Black skirt, wearing black choker, wearing black wireless cat-ear headset
appearance.face: Narrow eyes, cold gaze with a hint of distant confusion
appearance.hairstyle: Long black hair to waist, bangs
